title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height does not adjust to the new font size immediately after it is modified.
EB: The label height should be adjusted to match the font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Edit the font size of the label to '18 points'.
